page.title: 19POTTEN END-HAIRSTYLES.
page.content:
THIS IS ABOUT THE HAIRSTYLES IN 1985. STYLES OF HAIR THIS YEAR CONSIST OF THE LONGEST OF HAIR, TO THE SHORTEST. AT THE MOMENT THE MOST POPULAR STYLE IS A 'BOB' AT THE NAPE OF THE NECK, SHORT ON THE TOP AND SIDES. ANOTHER POPULAR STYLE IS PERMED HAIR WHICH MAKES YOUR HAIR WAVY OR CURLY.
MANY PEOPLE ALSO COLOUR THEIR HAIR IN A VARIETY OF COLOURS INCLUDING BROWN, BLONDE, BLACK, GINGER AND MANY OTHER COLOURS.YOU CAN ALSO GET COLOUR WASHES WHICH DO NOT GIVE A PERMANENT COLOUR BUT CAN BE WASHED OUT VERY SIMPLY AND QUICKLY AS THOUGH IT WERE SHAMPOO.
THIS IS JUST A QUICK EXAMPLE OF SOME OF THE THINGS BEING DONE WITH HAIR IN 1985.
